sanskrit_verse:
अभिवादात्परं विप्रो ज्यायांसमभिवादयन् ।
असौ नामाहमस्मीति स्वं नाम परिकीर्तयेत् ॥ २.१२२॥
transliteration:
abhivādātparaṃ vipro jyāyāṁsam abhivādayan .
asau nāmāham asmīti svaṁ nāma parikīrtayet .. 2.122 ..
sph_interpretive_translation: After offering salutation to a senior Brahmin, the wise one shall proclaim his own name by saying 'I am [Name]'.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority through Recognition: Identity affirmation establishes relational dharmic order.
Causation via Acknowledgment: Proper acknowledgment initiates lawful interaction.
Capacity-based Responsibility: The knower must declare identity to activate social contract.
Restoration Logic: Naming oneself aligns consciousness with truth and mutual recognition.
Consciousness Alignment: Self-declaration aligns individual awareness with cosmic order.
executable_legal_axioms: IF entity offers formal salutation to recognized elder THEN entity MUST self-identify by name.
IF entity fails to self-identify after salutation THEN transaction is void until corrected.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court proceedings, invocation of dharma-based identity protocols requires that all parties formally acknowledge presence through self-naming post-respectful address. This ensures jurisdictional clarity rooted in ontological accuracy rather than procedural formality.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa lies in witnessed self-declaration which creates causal sequence for lawful engagement. There is no fault assigned for omission; completion occurs upon re-declaration without penalty. Sequence follows natural unfolding of dharma (anupūrvaśaḥ).
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Re-invitation to perform correct naming within witnessed context.
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Individual confirms presence and intent through self-declaration.
Capacity Restoration: Guidance provided to ensure future compliance aligned with svadharma.
Integrity Reintegration: Witnessed repetition of proper protocol restores relational harmony.
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, identity declaration after respectful salutation is established as Dharma. Justice flows from consciousness alignment, not punitive enforcement. Reality remains non-dual and ever-restored. Consciousness is the Supreme Adjudicator.
